text: Dung i ro ma sada halak ni Debata mandapothon raja ni Israel, ninna ma mandok ibana: Songon on do hata ni Jahowa: Ala naung didok halak Ram, Debata pandingini di angka dolok do Jahowa, ndada Debata pandingini di adaran, dibahen i nunga hupasahat tu tanganmu sandok jolma na deak on, asa tung ditanda hamu, Ahu do Jahowa.
